answers.answer: I was told with me having didi twins, gestational and extra fluid that I would not go past 38 weeks and this week I am 37. My doctor will plan on inducing or c-section based on babies position tomorrow after ultrasound. Keeping fingers crossed that they are now both head down and looking forward to dr scheduling induction for next week. But I have heard of women having vaginal after c-section so I do not see why induction would be a problem. Good luck.

question: Hi all, just curious, pls, is it possible for a pregnant woman who had c- section before to be induce in second pregnancy due to gestational diabetes because I was told I won't be allowed to reach 40weeks , so hopefully this week be cause I will be 39weeks by Saturday and my next appointment is Thursday , that is when they will decide if i am going to be induced or c- section . Thank you
title: C-section and induction risk
